abstract: Lol...Jay can’t count space invaders on an empty stomach!

Great way to see the city! We're getting a great to do list from you for when we visit later this year, so thanks for all the great info as always :) Plus your food choice dilemma sounds exactly like us at 11:24 - too many great options for one meal  😂
Happy 2 year anniversary keep up the great informative vlogs.
